thread.title: BRIEF-Seattle Genetics And Astellas Receive FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation For Enfortumab Vedotin

title: BRIEF-Seattle Genetics And Astellas Receive FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation For Enfortumab Vedotin

organizations.name: brief-seattle genetics and astellas receive fda

text: March 26, 2018 / 12:16 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Seattle Genetics And Astellas Receive FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation For Enfortumab Vedotin Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - Seattle Genetics Inc: * SEATTLE GENETICS AND ASTELLAS RECEIVE FDA BREAKTHROUGH THERAPY DESIGNATION FOR ENFORTUMAB VEDOTIN IN LOCALLY ADVANCED OR METASTATIC UROTHELIAL CANCER * SEATTLE GENETICS INC - COS ARE ALSO EVALUATING ENFORTUMAB VEDOTIN IN OTHER SOLID TUMORS, INCLUDING OVARIAN AND NON-SMALL CELL LUNG CARCINOMA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
